tool_description: This API returns an amazing list of football clubs and the countries they belong to.
name: Football Clubs List
title: Football Clubs List

api_list.name: GET All Clubs
api_list.description: This returns a total list of football clubs available at the moment.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-clubs-list.p.rapidapi.com/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-clubs-list.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://football-clubs-list.p.rapidapi.com/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-clubs-list.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET clubs Specific
api_list.description: This endpoint gets the list of clubs for the country provided as a query.
